SQL Example: SELECT order_id, top_line_product_sales AS gross_sales, created_at FROM Orders WHERE created_at >= "2024-01-01"
Expected Output: Order ID, Gross Sales Amount, Order Date

SQL Example: SELECT o.order_id, o.top_line_product_sales, cs.customers_first_purchase_at_merchant FROM Orders o LEFT JOIN CustomerSnapshots cs ON o.order_id = cs.id
Expected Output: Order details with new/returning customer flag

SQL Example: SELECT o.order_id, o.top_line_product_sales, pr.device_nickname, c.channel_name, l.location_name, o.team_member_collected, cs.customers_first_purchase_at_merchant FROM Orders o LEFT JOIN CustomerSnapshots cs ON o.order_id = cs.id LEFT JOIN PaymentAndRefunds pr ON o.order_id = pr.order_id LEFT JOIN Location l ON o.location_id = l.location_id LEFT JOIN Channel c ON o.sales_channel_id = c.channel_id
Expected Output: All requested dimensions with gross sales

SQL Example: SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as visit_frequency FROM Orders WHERE customer_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY customer_id
